title: Is stereotype bashing someone's political affiliation reportable?
body:
Title^
*Context, just got out of a game where an enemy would call all trump supporters Idiots, rats, thieves, and liars; because my clan tag had associations with him.

replies.body: In most cases, it's not the exact words or phrases used, but how they're used. If somebody is harassing you, it doesn't really matter what's being said, since the intent behind it is harassment. So definitely, report it. If the person harasses other players often (regardless of reason), and enough people are reporting them for it, they will be punished.

Alright, so It's a matter of context and not necessarily that its bashing a political side.  Say if someone said "You're dumb because X" its not necessarily because they said X, but because of the "you're dumb" aspect of it? Thanks, i wasn't sure where it wouldve been classified under so I just placed under harassment.

correct.

"you're a liberal so ___"

"you're a conservative so ___"

"you're not a college student so ___"

"you're not a blue collar worker so ___"

"you're a blue collar worker so ___"

"you're a homosexual so ___ "

"you're not a homosexual so ___"

"you're black so ___"

"you're white so ___"

"you're male so ___"

"you're female so ___"

"you're (  ) so (  ) "

all of these are hate speech when the end of that sentence ends with something considered offensive or derogatory. even when it's something positive it's still more or less improper association and can be taken in a negative way. depending on the context anything that accuses someone of something based on affiliation is negative by nature. of course insults are minor, threats are more serious, and attacks are criminal. most of today's hate speech is categorized as insults due to law enforcement protecting civilians from harm. since insults do little damage over the last decade and the expansion of the internet it's become common routine to laugh off hate speech and insults as just stereo-type jokes. that doesn't make it right, but at the same time there are bigger things to worry about. report it as hate speech and riot will take care of it. be aware that many people are unfamiliar with what hate speech even is or how serious it can be if your country doesn't actively protect against it getting out of control. hate speech can easily lead to extremist groups forming when the end of those sentences becomes "you should die". it's a slippery slope from "i hate you" to "you should die". that is why it's taken so seriously.

    Examples

noun
1.
speech that attacks, threatens, or insults a person or group on the basis of national origin, ethnicity, color, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability.

Well true the government in the US cannot punish you for speech, but Riot is a private company and while I tend to be on the side of people need to stop crying over offensive speech, Riot does have their right to regulate it in their game.
That falls under hate speech tbh. and riot doesn't take kindly to hate speech.
was it harassment? if so it is punishablr.
It has to be. If you get punished for insulting someone's sexual orientation, race, or religion, then insulting someone's political views must be punished as well.
It wasn't insulting political views per se, it was insulting me FOR my political views. I don't really care about the former, since it doesn't really affect me. But the latter does.

That sounds a lot like Hate Speech to me. Any kind of verbal harassment because of a prejudiced conclusion is pretty much classified as such, its not just racial and homophobic slurs. So if someone was harassing you on the sole premise that you are or may be a Trump supporter, that could be very well considered Hate Speech.
